q_en: What are the cutting tasks that will only start after May 1, 2024?

steps.sql: SELECT ct.id, ct.start_time, ct.end_time, wg.name AS working_group_name, op.id AS order_product_id, p.attributes AS product_attributes, pt.description AS product_type FROM cutting_tasks ct JOIN working_group wg ON ct.working_group_id = wg.id JOIN order_product op ON ct.order_product_id = op.id JOIN products p ON op.product_id = p.id JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE ct.start_time > '2024-05-01';
steps.description: Retrieve cutting tasks that have a start time after May 1, 2024

response:
Sure thing! Here are the cutting tasks that will start after May 1, 2024. Let's take a look at the details:

| Task ID | Start Time       | End Time         | Working Group     | Order Product ID | Product Attributes | Product Type |
|---------|------------------|------------------|-------------------|------------------|--------------------|--------------|
| 32      | June 1, 2024     | June 17, 2024    | Master Sewers     | 32               | Black, XL size     | Jacket       |
| 31      | May 10, 2024     | May 26, 2024     | Master Cutters    | 31               | Pink, M size       | Skirt        |
| 33      | June 25, 2024    | July 17, 2024    | Master Cutters    | 33               | Grey, 29 size      | Pants        |
| 34      | June 30, 2024    | July 10, 2024    | Expert Cutters    | 34               | Purple, M size     | Skirt        |

These tasks are all set to start after the date you mentioned. If you have any more questions or need further details, feel free to ask! ðŸ˜Š
